ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark for Lower Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Be careful... I ve had them aggro on me in The Overthere and some other zones. Maybe just wierd settings on the ones in ill omen.  I ve had some of the
ygData.messageBody:
Be careful...

I've had them aggro on me in "The Overthere" and some other zones.

Maybe just wierd settings on the ones in ill omen. I've had some of the
goblins there ignore me too... also the fish in the lake seem to ignore you.

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: "Papa Legba" <legba@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:42 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Kunark for Lower Levels


> Lake is a great place, like South Karana used to be before the hordes
> showed up...
>
> The Sabrethooth con ready to attack like all animals, but aren't
> agressive. Oddly they don't even jump you while you med though (like so
> many cats do in the Karanas). Being a bard I used to always watch out
> for wandering kitties and protect the casters...
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
